widget.name: 7 Minute Workout
widget.description: 7 Minute Workout is all you need to get fit and healthy. With only 7 minutes per day you can feel better and live a fuller, happier life as a result of it. See http://well.blogs.nytimes.com/2013/05/09/the-scientific-7-minute-workout/ for more information.
widget.author: Tycho Luyben
